entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the evening then becoming west 20 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023
